location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed in colour on paper with manuscript additions in coloured pencilDimensions: 790 x 990 mm

mods.abstract: Map showing Persia and the Persian Gulf. The map shows cities, roads, and hydrology, and highlights the scale of Russian trade and British trade. There are some boundaries traced by hand: in yellow the boundary suggested in Sistan, and in blue the border preferred by Kerman.
